basics.name: Kishan Beladiya
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Hi, I'm Kishan. Currently doing B.Tech at IIIT Kota in Computer Science department. My technical skills is frontend and backend development, Intermediate in Compititive Programming, Good at data structures and algorithms. i'm also good at Native Application development using Dart's framework - Flutter.

location.address: Near P.P. Savani School, Hirabaug - varachha road ,Surat - Gujarat

publications.title: WhatsApp Status Downloader | Native Application
publications.details: This Application helps user to download status from the WhatsApp. I also included other social networking sites, link instagram. This Application can save, share and also delete saved status. I published this application on Play Store and also solved some bugs that suggested by my application user
